about_the_game:
◆　Controls
Left Click: Confirm
Right Click: Cancel
ESC: Menu
Alt+Enter: Toggle Fullscreen

◆　Notice
All characters in this game are over 18 years old.
This game features an auto-save function, allowing you to resume your game anytime after closing it.

◆ Story
Nam, the swordswoman known as the "Dark Flame," has obtained information about the "Mirage Mansion" and set off to a certain desert to acquire the hidden treasures within. However, unknown dangers await her there.

◆　Game Content
This is a deck-building roguelike RPG. Collect cards and items to create more powerful decks and combos as you challenge the deepest parts of the mansion. There are multiple branching paths in each stage and within the stages themselves. Events and enemy placements are random, even in the same spot. The game features replayability elements. If you are defeated, you can restart from just before the battle. If you find a battle impossible to win, you can restart from the beginning while carrying over some of your gold and levels.

P.S. Nam, the heroine, was one of the characters in Disaster Dragon x Girls from Different Worlds released five years ago. While this game is mostly new, one of the defeat CGs was reused from the previous title.

◆　H-Scenes
25 new basic CGs

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains sexual acts or extreme violence like sexual assault/non-consensual sex, interspecies sex, BDSM, violence and nudity.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 400 MB available space

supported_languages:
